remarks.format: ## Remarks This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer.Collection%2A> property does not have a simple default value. This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>.
